description.en:

• Seiko is the cool-headed type of high school girl with black hair and straight-cut bangs. At first glance she looks dignified, but the truth is she's a perverted girl who's crazy about masturbation.

5.) Wakichichizuma (わきちちづま)

• A busty shrine maiden enjoys having sex with several demons all at once.

• A serpent woman (lamia) takes advantage of a young boy.

10.) High-Spirited Breasts Summer / Age Chichi Summer (アゲちちSummer)
• Shiina Banda is a huge-breasted tanned gyaru who came with her boyfriend to the beach for some swimming.

12-16.) Kuro no Innyuu (黒の陰乳)
• Suzuko Isade is a plain-looking high school girl with glasses, braided hair and massive tits. Her dark desires will ignite after bullies pair her up with a shota classmate, forcing her to take his virginity and deflower herself in public as they watch!

17). Kuro no Innyuu After (黒の淫乳 After)

*Note: Despite having the same romanized title, Chapter 4 (黒の淫乳) is a related but different story from Chapters 12-16 (黒の陰乳) featuring different characters. Chapter 17 is a sequel to both storylines.*
